name: Sirenpedia Simulator [Executable]
description:
Sirenpedia Simulator [Executable Version]

This is a police siren simulator for your computer, just like the real ones in a police car. Try it out!

Software includes the:

*Wail

*Yelp

*Horn

This software is the released version for Windows. If you cannot download this file, we have another version of Sirenpedia Simulator made for flash.

! When it says Error after the installation, dont worry, locate the installed file and hopefully it will run !

Click "Run Anyway" when prompt to.
